Popular Playthings

About Us

There are few things in life that bring greater joy than watching a child play with a toy that captures their full attention and sparks their imagination! For over 20 years, Popular Playthings has been developing and manufacturing toys for children 18 months to 8 years. Our products are both developmentally and educationally appropriate while providing open-ended creative play! The strongest lines in the Popular Playthings’ family of products provide extended play opportunities because all the sets within each line are interchangeable, creating ultimate play value!


Our Mission

Product quality is equally as important to us as well. Knowing that what you manufacture provides unparalleled play value is highly rewarding and when it’s coupled with product quality, it’s amazing! We utilize our own manufacturing facility to ensure each and every toy we produce meets our high standards for the quality and safety you rely on.
